comment.body: How exactly do you pin stuff?

> [grimsdottir](#comment_4_1Q3DcejYbdNFDSDdjpznMmgg1ZCzn1SUsn): By editing the "Date published" of this post to always be the latest published/updated, it then sticks to the top of the blog, rinse and repeat as you add more articles :)

Ah. So can I set it to the year 9999?
